source_item.name: Greater Rune of the Void Ritual

effects.display_string: Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to cast Icebound Fortitude for 4 sec and gain Luck of the Draw! which increases your damage dealt by 15% for 12 sec.

Set: Luck of the Draw! has 2 sec increased duration.

While Luck of the Draw! is active, Death Strike costs 10 less Runic Power and can strike up to 2 additional nearby enemies.

Set: Luck of the Draw! has 2 sec increased duration.

While Luck of the Draw! is active, Death Strike costs 10 less Runic Power and can strike up to 2 additional nearby enemies.

name: Sleeveless T-Shirt
description: On the inside collar it reads, 'Inspected by Earl Z. Moade.'

spells.description: Equip: Taking damage has a chance to erupt the ground, covering you in a layer of dark oil that absorbs 500,997 damage for 15 sec. When the shield is broken, it splatters nearby enemies for 120,294 Shadow damage.

name: Mechano-Core Amplifier

spells.description: Equip: Your harmful abilities have a chance to power the amplifier, randomly increasing either your highest secondary stat by 4,395 or your lowest secondary stat by 5,545 for 10 sec.

description: Intended for machine use only. Use at your own risk.

spells.description: Use: Increase movement speed by 150% and allow you to skim over water, rapidly diminishing over 1 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)
